knimeNode.name: Keras Network Exporter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Exports a Keras network to a file.

fullDescription.intro: Export a Keras network to a file.
fullDescription.option:
The exporter to use.
Keras H5 Exporter: Exports the Keras deep learning network including its weights to a *.h5 file.
The location of the output file. KNIME URLs like "knime://knime.workflow/ ... <filename>" are supported.
